Summary I’m a Senior UI / Front End Web Developer with deep knowledge of most the technologies used on the web. 
 
My background includes several years of web developing and problem solving, resulting in a strong understanding of the life cycle of a web application and how it works. 
I have an analytical mind, this allows me to quickly find the best and easiest way to approach and solve business problems. I've worked on several projects both as a front-end team leader and a developer utilizing the Agile / Scrum methodology. 
 
I also have a good knowledge about back-end technologies. 
 
My enthusiasm allows me to work under pressure and quickly solve technical challenges whilst always generating a clean, clear and reusable code when building high quality products. 
My experience includes several public facing web sites, using several cms and e-commerce platforms for high revenue projects.  
 
I always enjoy learning new technologies and keep myself updated. Summary I’m a Senior UI / Front End Web Developer with deep knowledge of most the technologies used on the web.
